home.title: Secure Document Verification
home.subtitle: Blockchain-powered document authentication and digital signatures
home.features.verify: Verify documents instantly using blockchain technology
landing.hero.title: Secure Documents with Blockchain Notarization
landing.hero.subtitle: Create, sign, and verify documents with cryptographic integrity. Tamper-proof authenticity through blockchain technology while maintaining complete privacy and regulatory compliance.
landing.features.title: Why Choose BlockSign
landing.features.subtitle: Enterprise-Grade Security Meets User-Friendly Design
landing.features.description: Our platform combines cutting-edge blockchain technology with intuitive workflows to deliver unmatched document security and verification capabilities for organizations worldwide.
landing.features.crypto.title: Cryptographic Integrity
landing.features.crypto.description: Documents are secured using cryptographic hashes stored on the blockchain, ensuring immutability and tamper-proof verification without exposing sensitive content.
landing.features.verification.title: Instant Verification
landing.features.verification.descriptio: Verify document authenticity instantly by comparing locally computed hashes with blockchain records. No intermediaries required.
landing.features.compliance.title: Regulatory Compliance
landing.features.compliance.description: Built to meet GDPR and eIDAS requirements with strong privacy controls, secure authentication, and comprehensive audit trails.
landing.features.workflows.title: Multi-Party Workflows
landing.features.workflows.description: Streamlined approval processes with participant assignment, signature collection, and automated workflow management.
landing.features.global.title: Global Accessibility
landing.features.global.description: Multi-language support (English, Russian, Romanian) with responsive web and mobile applications for worldwide accessibility.
landing.features.security.title: Advanced Security
landing.features.security.description: Multi-factor authentication, JWT session management, and identity verification with one-time personal identifier checks.
landing.testimonials.title: Customer Success Stories
landing.testimonials.subtitle: Trusted by Leading Organizations
landing.testimonials.description: See how organizations worldwide are securing their critical documents with BlockSign's blockchain technology.
landing.testimonials.testimonial1: BlockSign has revolutionized our document management. The blockchain verification gives us complete confidence in document authenticity, and the multi-party workflows have streamlined our approval processes significantly.
landing.testimonials.testimonial2: The GDPR compliance features and instant verification capabilities have made BlockSign essential for our European operations. It's secure, fast, and incredibly user-friendly.
landing.testimonials.testimonial3: As a startup, we needed enterprise-grade security without the complexity. BlockSign delivers exactly that - powerful blockchain security with an intuitive interface that our team adopted immediately.
landing.stats.title: Platform Statistics
landing.stats.subtitle: Trusted by Organizations Worldwide
landing.stats.description: Join thousands of users who trust BlockSign for their most critical document security needs.
landing.pricing.title: Simple, Transparent Pricing
landing.pricing.subtitle: Choose Your Security Level
landing.pricing.description: Start free and scale as you grow. All plans include blockchain verification and GDPR compliance.
landing.pricing.starter.title: Starter
landing.pricing.starter.description: Perfect for individuals and small teams
landing.pricing.professional.title: Professional
landing.pricing.enterprise.title: Enterprise
landing.cta.title: Ready to Secure Your Documents?
landing.cta.description: Join thousands of organizations already using BlockSign to protect their most critical documents. Start your free trial today and experience the future of document security.
